{"id":531353325,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1627786599,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/531353325/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Garden Perimeter to Collect Enough Apples","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minimumPerimeter(long long n) {\n        long long l = 0 , h = 5e5;\n        \n        int ans = 0 ;\n        while(l <= h){\n            long long m = (l+h)/2;\n            long long apples = 2LL *  (2*m +1)  * (m) * (m+1);\n            if(apples >= n){\n                ans = 2*m;\n                h = m-1;\n            }else{\n                l = m + 1;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return ans * 4;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-garden-perimeter-to-collect-enough-apples"}
